title: Loading times are HUGE
body:
The only thing I have open whilst playing is my discord ( to talk with friends) and perhaps a spotify playlist in the background. But if flipping takes 3 minutes for me to go from 0% to 100% which is absurd for my specs and for a game such as league, I have like 300fps in game so why does it take so long to load?

CPU- i5 3330
GPU- GTX 1050ti
ram- 4gb ddr3 1600mhz
hdd- 1tb

I know buying an ssd would greatly improve my loading times but I have a few friends who have similar specs and who don't have an SSD and their game literally loads up in 2-5 seconds .. help pls

replies.body: Are you running on Wi-fi at all?  With all those services playing in the background, it could be straining your connection to reach the game server.  See if configuring your DNS via the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help speed things up a bit, as well as power cycling your router.  This may likely be less of a hard hard drive issue, and more of your connection trying to get those assets ready.
